meanings.definition: Containing a high amount of starch
meanings.sent1: The mashed potatoes were the starchiest dish on the menu.
meanings.sent2: The bread with the most starch was the starchiest of them all.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that the starchiest foods were the secret to a full belly.
meanings.sent4: Her starchiest outfit made her look like a walking potato.
meanings.sent5: The starchiest foods always left a heavy feeling in his stomach.

meanings.sent1: The rice with the highest starch content was the starchiest of all.
meanings.sent2: The pasta dish was the starchiest meal she had ever tasted.
meanings.sent3: The scientist marveled at the starchiest potato he had ever seen.
meanings.sent4: Her starchiest dress made her feel like a starch queen.
meanings.sent5: The starchiest vegetables were always the most filling.

meanings.sent1: The starchiest fabric felt rough and stiff against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The starchiest shirt in his closet was uncomfortable to wear.
meanings.sent3: The starchiest paper crumpled easily and felt brittle.
meanings.sent4: Her starchiest attitude made her seem rigid and unyielding.
meanings.sent5: The starchiest behavior always stood out in a crowd.
